articles.description: Bridgerton fans have been recreating the early-19th century look portrayed in Netflix's hit show. And British search engine Lyst now claims demand for corsets and empire line dresses has soared.
articles.content:
It's been the lockdown must-watch, but it seems Bridgerton is now inspiring how we dress, with fans donning Regency-era style garments and sharing their looks on social media.
Viewers smitten with t… [+1947 chars]

articles.author: Kevin Kayhart
articles.title: Tom Holland slips into iconic superhero suit for a chase scene for Spider-Man 3 - Daily Mail
articles.description: Tom Holland slipped into the iconic red and blue superhero suit and swooped in from high above during a chase scene for Spider-Man 3 in Atlanta on Saturday.
articles.content:
Tom Holland has been hard at work filming Marvel's untitled Spider-Man 3 in Atlanta since late October 2020.
And on Saturday, some two-and-a-half months later, the British-born actor was caught in a… [+2607 chars]
